channel.title: Castle wars error
channel.description:
ok i get this when i compile [code] client.java:6046: illegal start of type if (objectID == 4484) // Show scoreboard in lobby ^ client.java:8160: <identifier> expected }; ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
i tried many times to add the ; i seemed not getting what the complier saying :confused:
any help please? Thanks in Advance[br][size=1]Posted at: July 25, 2006, 02:30:19 PM[/size][hr]any help please?[br][size=1]Posted at: July 25, 2006, 10:22:04 PM[/size][hr]is some thing got to do with the public voids?
where should i put them, it said "put them with the public voids"
mayeb i didin't get what he meant, any one know where should i put it?
thanks in advance.

your just missing a "}" somewhere near the end of that line.
